page.title: 11GALA LONGTOWN,CUMBRIA.
page.content: 1985 Saw the tenth Longtown Gala which owes its inception to the Youth Club Management Committee,who also organise the choice of the Gala Queen, from the membership of the Youth Club.The centre-piece of the event is the Parade of Children,in fancy dress and of decorated floats,led by the bands through the streets of Longtown.In this year's gala there was the added attraction of horses and riders,led by Lochinvar and his bride.Many local people are involved in the planning ,design,and construction of the floats .The vehicles on which they are mounted are kindly loaned by local firms,whose drivers also volunteer their services free.In addition their are many other organised activities, such as,Tug O'War,Darts,Round The Holme Race ,Clay-Pidgeon Shoot,Pool, Football,Fun Run,and Hound Trails.
